ingest-processing.normalization: Each video/audio stream contained in the WAVE file will be normalized according to the Action Plan for FCLA Supported Video/Audio Stream Formats (“Audio Streams in WAVE files” section). If the audio stream encoding is not in the list of currently supported audio stream formats for WAVE files, the audio stream will not be normalized and the original WAVE file will be preserved as bit-level.

long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to newer WAVE versions or to an open, standardized and well supported audio file format that is to be a good successor for the WAVE file format.
long-term-strategy.normalized: Not applicable for WAVE file format. For the normalized audio stream formats, please see the Action Plan for FCLA Supported Video/Audio Stream Formats.

short-term-actions.action: Please see the Action Plan for FCLA Supported Video/Audio Stream Formats.
